title: Instructional Design Strategies to Enhance Participation in Online Video Lectures

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of online learning environments and practical experience in scientific fields
context.additional_context: Instructional design strategies to enhance engagement in live online video lectures for current science practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can develop learning materials by applying five core elements (instructional method design, curriculum structuring, time parameter setting, netiquette establishment, media utilization) when designing video lectures
Learners can analyze educational effectiveness using survey tools to measure online lecture participation
Learners can apply three specific strategies to enhance learner engagement in real-time online lecture environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
